title: Adobe Creative Cloud Design Tools Digital Classroom [PDF]
description:
Adobe Creative Cloud Design Tools Digital Classroom
Authors: Jennifer Smith, Jeremy Osborn, The AGI Creative Team
Published: September 30, 2013
Publisher: Wiley
ISBN: 9781118639993
Format: Retail PDF
Reader required: Adobe Reader, Adobe Digital Editions
Tested on the above readers with no problems. Don't hesitate to PM me if you have any questions, comments on the torrent are easy to miss. Please allow a couple seconds for th seedboxes to engage, then it should be fairly quick.
Note: The paperback version of this book has a companion DVD. The ebook has a companion website that is referred to in the book, it contains all the content on the DVD and gives you a link which requires email registration.
Once you register, the link leads you here (checked and verified): <a href="
http://www.digitalclassroombooks.com/CC/DesignTools/files.html" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.digitalclassroombooks.com/CC/DesignTools/files.html</a>
So you can download the lessons and watch the video tutorials without registering by following the link above. The video tuts go over the same lessons that are in the book.
____________________________________________________________________________

Full-color guide and video tutorials make a powerful combo for learning design applications in the Adobe Creative Cloud

If you like the idea of tackling the design and web applications in AdobeÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Creative Cloud in smaller bites, then this is the book-and-video training learning combo for you. More than 25 lessons, each including step-by-step instructions and lesson files backed by video tutorials, help you get comfortable with all features and functions. Work at your own pace, while you steadily build skills in InDesign, Illustrator, Photoshop, Dreamweaver, Flash, and Fireworks. With this Digital Classroom training package, you have your own private instructor showing you the easiest way to learn the latest Adobe design apps.

-Combines a full-color, step-by-step instructional book along with lesson files and video training on companion website, to teach users how to use the latest versions of InDesign CC, Illustrator CC, Photoshop CC, Dreamweaver CC, Flash CC, Fireworks CC, and Adobe Bridge
-Provides thorough training from a team of expert instructors from American Graphics Institute (AGI)
Start confidently creating the rich and interactive content viewers demand with this practical learning product, Adobe Creative Cloud Digital Classroom

Note: DVD and other supplementary materials are not included as part of the e-book file, but are available on the companion website
